typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		OS_Project_Overview_ID as integer,
		OS_Scenario_ID as integer,
		Project_Flag as string,
		Year_Submitted as integer,
		Project_Name as string,
		OSR_Project_Number as string,
		Operator as string,
		Project_Area_Region as string,
		Scenario as string,
		Phase as string,
		Technology as string,
		Density as decimal(18,12),
		Sulphur as string,
		TAN as string,
		Net_Cumulative_Balance as decimal(19,4),
		Capacity_Bitumen as decimal(16,1),
		Capacity_Steam as decimal(16,1),
		Project_Status as string,
		{Project_Suspended/Cancelled/Deferred} as string,
		Project_Indefinitely as string,
		Project_Source as string,
		Deleted as boolean,
		DeletedDate as timestamp,
		AdditionalNotes as string,
		ProjectPayoutDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> SourceOSProjects
source(output(
		OSScenarioKey as integer,
		OSRNumber as string,
		Scenario as string,
		YearSubmitted as integer,
		Version as integer,
		AsOfDate as timestamp,
		Comments as string,
		CreatedDate as timestamp,
		CreatedBy as string,
		Deleted as boolean,
		DeletedDate as timestamp,
		LastUpdateTime as timestamp,
		RunId as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SourceScenario
SourceOSProjects, SourceScenario join(trim(OSR_Project_Number,' ') == OSRNumber
	&& Year_Submitted == YearSubmitted
	&& trim(SourceOSProjects@Scenario, ' ') == SourceScenario@Scenario,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		ProjectFlag = Project_Flag,
		YearSubmitted = Year_Submitted,
		ProjectName = Project_Name,
		OSRNumber = OSR_Project_Number,
		Operator,
		ProjectAreaRegion = Project_Area_Region,
		Phase,
		Technology,
		Density,
		Sulphur,
		TAN,
		NetCumulativeBalance = Net_Cumulative_Balance,
		BitumenCapacity = Capacity_Bitumen,
		SteamCapacity = Capacity_Steam,
		ProjectStatus = Project_Status,
		{Project_Suspended/Cancelled/Deferred},
		ProjectIndefinitely = Project_Indefinitely,
		ProjectSource = Project_Source,
		Deleted = SourceOSProjects@Deleted,
		DeletedDate = SourceOSProjects@DeletedDate,
		AdditionalNotes,
		ProjectPayoutDate,
		OSScenarioKey
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		OSProjectKey as integer,
		OSScenarioKey as integer,
		ProjectFlag as string,
		YearSubmitted as integer,
		ProjectName as string,
		OSRNumber as string,
		Operator as string,
		ProjectAreaRegion as string,
		Phase as string,
		Technology as string,
		Density as decimal(18,4),
		Sulphur as string,
		TAN as string,
		NetCumulativeBalance as decimal(19,4),
		BitumenCapacity as decimal(16,1),
		StreamCapacity as decimal(16,1),
		ProjectStatus as string,
		Project_SusCancDeffered as string,
		ProjectIndefinitely as string,
		ProjectSource as string,
		Deleted as boolean,
		DeletedDate as timestamp,
		AdditionalNotes as string,
		ProjectPayoutDate as timestamp,
		LastUpdateTime as timestamp,
		RunId as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		OSScenarioKey,
		ProjectFlag,
		YearSubmitted,
		ProjectName,
		OSRNumber,
		Operator,
		ProjectAreaRegion,
		Phase,
		Technology,
		Density,
		Sulphur,
		TAN,
		NetCumulativeBalance,
		BitumenCapacity,
		StreamCapacity = SteamCapacity,
		ProjectStatus,
		Project_SusCancDeffered = {Project_Suspended/Cancelled/Deferred},
		ProjectIndefinitely,
		ProjectSource,
		Deleted,
		DeletedDate,
		AdditionalNotes,
		ProjectPayoutDate
	)) ~> TargetTable
